st: Main Apni Aankhon Mein Jab Us Ki Khuwab Sochti Hoon
s:
Main Apni Aankhon Mein Jab Us Ki Khuwab Sochti Hoon
Tu Kushboo Sy Mehakte Gulab Sochti Hoon……..
Yeh Mari Taqat e Parwazz Ka Hunar Hy Ke Main
Haroof Likhti Hoon Lekin Kitab Sochti Hoon….

st: Ap Mere Se Rahe Chahe Jitni Dur,
s:
Ap Mere Se Rahe Chahe Jitni Dur,
Khowab Me Ana Bas Kijiye Manjur,
Chahta Hoon Ap Ek Wada Toh Karen,
Phir Vale Hi Ap Mere Sath Na Chalen

st: Kabhi Hum Tute Toh Kabhi Khwaab Tute
s:
Kabhi Hum Tute Toh Kabhi Khwaab Tute
Na Jane Kitne Tukdo Mein Armaan Tute
Har Tukda Aaina Hai Zindgi Ka
Har Aaine Ke Saath Laakhon Jazbaat Tute..

st: Dur Isharo Se Kabhi Bat Nahi Hoti
s:
Dur Isharo Se Kabhi Bat Nahi Hoti
Chand Aansu Bahane Se Barsat Nahi Hoti
Yeh Jindagi Koi Khawab Nahi Haqqit He
Aankhen Band Karlene Se Rat Nahi Hoti.

st: Tum Haqeeqat Nahi Ho Hasrat Ho
s:
Tum Haqeeqat Nahi Ho Hasrat Ho
Jo Mile Khawab Mein Wahi Doulat Ho
Kis Liye Dekhti Ho Aaina
Tum To Khud Se B Jyada Khubsurat Ho

st: Rone Vi Nahi Dete, Hasne Vi Nahi Dete,
s:
Rone Vi Nahi Dete, Hasne Vi Nahi Dete,
Jine Vi Nahi Dete, Marne Bhi Nahi Dete,
Kehte Hai Wo Gayero Ko Lao Na Khyalo Mein,
Aur Khud Apne Khyalo Mein Khone Bhi Nahi Dete.

st: Yaad Aate Hai To Zara Kho Lete Hai
s:
Yaad Aate Hai To Zara Kho Lete Hai
Aansu Ankho Me Uter Aye To Zara Ro Lete Hai
Nind Aakho Me Aate Nahi Laken
Aap Khuwabon Me Ayaingay Yahi Soch Kar So Lete Hai

st: Mat Juda Kerna Usko Aankhon Sey
s:
Mat Juda Kerna Usko Aankhon Sey
Khwaab Ka Phir Dhuan Miley Na Miley

st: Meri Aankhen Bhi Mujhse Ek Din Yeh Keh Den Gi
s:
Meri Aankhen Bhi Mujhse Ek Din Yeh Keh Den Gi
Khuwab Uske Na Dekha Karo Hum Se Ab Roya Nahi Jata..

st: Kashish Dil Ki Har Cheez Bhula Deti Hai
s:
Kashish Dil Ki Har Cheez Bhula Deti Hai
Band Aakhon Mein Bhi Sapne Saja Deti Hai
Sapno Ki Duniya Jarur Rakhna Dost
Kyun Ki Hakikat Aksar Logo Ko Rula Deti Hai

st: Palko K Kinare Jo Hum Ne Bhigoye Hi Nahi
s:
Palko K Kinare Jo Hum Ne Bhigoye Hi Nahi
Woh Ye Sochte Hai Ki Hum Kabhi Roye Hi Nahi
Puchte Hai Ki Khwab Mei Kisse Dekhte Ho
Wo Kya Jane Ki Ek Arse Hum Soye Hi Nahi

st: Meri Aankhon Ko Yeh Sab Kon Bataane Degaa
s:
Meri Aankhon Ko Yeh Sab Kon Bataane Degaa
Khwab Jis Ke Hain Wahi Neend Na Aane Degaa

st: Khyalo Se Chu Lo To Chala Aau Mai ,
s:
Khyalo Se Chu Lo To Chala Aau Mai ,
Dil Se Pukaro To Chala Aau Mai,
Maine Apni Jaan Se Jyada Chaha Tuje
Tu Hi Khafa Hi Jaye To Bata Kaha Jau Mai

st: Bheegi Hui Aankhon Ka Yeh Manzar Na Milega,
s:
Bheegi Hui Aankhon Ka Yeh Manzar Na Milega,
Ghar Chhod Ke Mat Jao Kahi Ghar Na Milega,
Phir Yaad Bahut Aayegi Zulfon Ki Ghani Shaam,
Jab Dhoop Mein Koi Saaya Sir Par Na Milega,
Aansoo Ko Kabhi Auz Ka Katra Na Samajhna,
Aisa Tumhe Chahat Ka Samandar Nahi Milega,

Is Khawaab Ke Mahol Mein Bhi Khawaab Hai Aankhein,
Jab Neend Bahut Aayegi,Bistar Na Milega,
Yeh Soch Lo Ab Akhri Saya Hai Mohabbat,
Is Dar Se Jo Uthogi To Koi Dar Na Milega..!!!

st: Daag Ansuon Se Dhoye Hain
s:
Daag Ansuon Se Dhoye Hain
Jab Bhi Tanha Huye Roye Hain
Dil Mein Kyonkar Na Uge Yaad Teri
Dil Mein Tere Hi Khuwab Boye Hain

st: Mann To Mann Hai, Mann Ko Kya Kahena
s:
Mann To Mann Hai, Mann Ko Kya Kahena
Hum Aayenge Sapno Mein, Sapno Ko Kya Kahena

st: Na Khwabo Mein Dekha
s:
Na Khwabo Mein Dekha
Na Nazaro Mein Dekha
Nahi Mila Behtar Tum Se Koi
Humne Apko Hazaro Mein Dekha

st: Tum Jo Har Roz Yuon Khawabon Men Chale Ate Ho
s:
Tum Jo Har Roz Yuon Khawabon Men Chale Ate Ho
Zulam Acha Hay Magar Is Kadar Nahen Jana

st: Na Khuwabo Ki Tarah Ho,Na Khayalo Ki Tarah Ho
s:
Na Khuwabo Ki Tarah Ho,Na Khayalo Ki Tarah Ho
Tum Ilm-e-Riyazi Ke Sawalo Ki Tarha Ho
Uljhe Howe Itne Ke Har Koi Samajh Na Paye
Suljhe Howe Itne Ke Misaloo Ki Tarah Ho

st: Koe Aas Paas Nhi Raha Tu Khayal Teri Taraf Gya
s:
Koe Aas Paas Nhi Raha Tu Khayal Teri Taraf Gya
Mjhy Apna Aap Bhi Chuu Gya Tu Khayal Tri Trf Gya

st: Bari Mushkil Se Sulaya Hai Khud Ko Main Ne
s:
Bari Mushkil Se Sulaya Hai Khud Ko Main Ne
Apni In Ankhon Ko Tere Khwaab Ka Laalach De Ker…

st: Aaankh Kholi TU Jaag Uthi Hasratain
s:
Aaankh Kholi TU Jaag Uthi Hasratain
Usko B Khodia Jsy Paya Tha Khwaab May

st: Dostoon Tum Pey Bhi Guzra Hai Kabhi Ye Aalam
s:
Dostoon Tum Pey Bhi Guzra Hai Kabhi Ye Aalam
Neend Aati Nahin Aur Khwaab Nazar Aatey Hain
